Bank Deposit Information
  • 1. Wire Transfer in USD to the following Bank Account:
  • Payee/Beneficiary: MARCARIA.COM LLC
  • Bank: Citibank N.A.
  • Bank Address: 111 Wall Street, New York, NY, US
  • Routing number: 266086554
  • Account #: 3290321185
  • Swift Code: CITIUS33
  • Beneficiary Address: 501 Silverside Road, Suite 105, Wilmington, DE 19809, US
  • Reason for Payment: Reason for payment: Indicate your order number and/or your Marcaria.com user email.
  • Notes:
  • - Once you have completed the transfer, please email payments@marcaria.com with your payment confirmation and wire transfer form attached.
  • - Wire transfers take up to 7 days to complete. We will execute your service once payment has been received.
  • - Please add USD 30 for wire transfers from outside the U.S. as part of bank administration fees.
  • 2. Check Payment
  • Make check in USD, payable in a US Bank to MARCARIA.COM LLC and write on the back “For deposit only MARCARIA.COM LLC # 3290321185”. To process the service more promptly, send it by courier.
  • Please mail check to:
  • Marcaria.com
  • 501 Silverside Road, Suite 105,
  • Wilmington, DE 19809, USA
  • Notes:
  • - We do not recommend paying Domain Registrations/Renewals by check as they may take time to process, however if you choose to do so, please inform us immediately by emailing payments@marcaria.com.
